title: A Skeptic's Day in the Woods
prompt: You Enter a Rumored Haunted Forest...
description: I dont believe in ghosts, but I believe in profits from truffle hunting. Since everyone else in our town is scared to go in, I'm one of the only people who will even go to edge of these woods, much less venture into them. Yet I do, every day without fail to keep my truffle business flourishing, which it is! I have seen one other person on occasion, dear sweet Emily. She always offers to help, and comes dressed for the occasion every time, I'm starting to think she only owns one outfit...

title: I took a walk
description: I walked to my local park, and then through the local park, while listening to "Take a Walk" by Passion Pit. It was great! Walk walk walk!
prompt: Take a hike at a local park

title: Sleepy Times!
description: Naps are great, I am part cat

title: Running is for fit people
description: I don't run but I did walk. It was so nice and calm.

title: I am a cool cat
description: Now I can rollerblade! Can't catch me
prompt: Learn how to iceskate or rollerskate

title: LEGO MASTER
description: Empire State Building out of legos!

title: Hawaii!!
description: It's a tropical getaway! I want fresh pineapple and mojitos for breakfast.
prompt: Plan a vacation you've always wanted to take

title: Here Kitty kitty
description: I took them outside on a leash and they hated it. The whole time. I got scratched A LOT.
prompt: Take your cat on a walk

title: Learn more Japanese
description: Some day I'll be able to watch anime without the subtitles...

title: Fixing ones clothes
description: Being able to mend things is very helpful and helps cut down on waste!
prompt: Learn to sew on a button

title: Git what?
description: I know nothing about programming!! This stuff is weird
prompt: Learn about a distributed version control system such as Git

title: Russian
description: Erik knows Russian, I want to learn it! Then I can watch those cools films

title: The Witcher Book 1
description: I saw the show so I had to read the books!
prompt: Go to the library and find an interesting book

title: Can it Tye Dye?
description: I tie dyed a bunch of stuff, the floor, the wall, the ceiling... really I'm just a messy person.

title: I saw Cats!
description: Cats on Broadway instead of the hot garbo movie

title: Fancy Origami
description: I folded a lot of paper
prompt: Learn how to fold a paper crane
